body:
Hey my name is Wouter and I'm Dutch! :)

But this thread isn't about telling personal info. But this is made because I'm just curious what kind of language's people talk here on the forums. I talk: Dutch, French, Spanish, German, and English so my question is what kind of language do you talk? And how many Dutch people are looking at the forums because in game I see them a lot but on the forums I'm never sure.

So just leave a response down below and let me know where you are from and what language's you speak.

~Wouter
body_tagged:

~Wouter

replies.body:
Go in a sub-forum, for example Avicus Lounge and click the green button called New Discussion.
Give the new discussion a informative title and write something in the body.
Then click Post Discussion, your discussion should now be on the first page under Recent Discussions.
replies.body_tagged:
Go in a sub-forum, for example Avicus Lounge and click the green button called New Discussion.
Give the new discussion a informative title and write something in the body.
Then click Post Discussion, your discussion should now be on the first page under Recent Discussions.
